name: My Little Dome
description:
Your friend asked you to look after their little dome while they're away, but managing an ecosystem isn't an easy job! Keep the CO2 and Oxygen levels intact by taking care of the cows and the trees, but don't forget to take care of yourself!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We have a discord server. You could join to ask us questions or give feedback on the game. All the feedback is welcome!  

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/invite/CZunnZ
